availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Sherwood P. Burton (Boyle County, Kentucky, merchant and farmer.)

body.p: Boyle County, Kentucky, merchant and farmer. Mercer County, Kentucky, native. Son of Robert Burton and Margaret Burton. Married to S. A. Peters Burton in Boyle County, Kentucky, on May 13, 1852. Father of G. F. Burton and S. F. Burton. Married to Sarah E. Lee Burton in Boyle County on March 25, 1857. Father of Charles W. Burton. Merchant in Boyle County in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Boyle County in 1850. Farmer in Boyle County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Boyle County in 1850.
